## Plotting Gene Density

```{r}
# Load Libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read in file
setwd("~/qb25-answers/week1")
header <- c("chr", "start", "end", "count")
df_kc_19 <- read_tsv("hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names=header)
df_kc_16 <- read_tsv("hg16-kc-count.bed", col_names=header)
df_kc <- bind_rows( hg19=df_kc_19, hg16=df_kc_16, .id="assembly" )
```

```{r}
# Make plot with ggplot
ggplot(data = df_kc, aes(x=start, y=count, color=assembly)) +
  geom_line() + 
  facet_wrap(chr ~ ., scales="free")

```

```{r}
# Save plot
ggsave( "exercise2.png" )
```
